personal.title: Game Systems Architect & Senior Game Developer
personal.tagline: Crafting immersive experiences across Unity, Unreal, and Web platforms
personal.bio: Passionate game developer with 8+ years of experience building engaging games and interactive experiences. Specialized in multiplayer systems, VR/XR development, and game architecture. Currently architecting large-scale metaverse experiences at HighStreet.
